description: Enables an aquatic mob to dash at its target with knockback; includes overshoot and cooldown settings.

attack_reach.description: Horizontal reach grown around the mob's AABB to register a hit. Default value: 0.05.

charge_cooldown_time.description: Range of time in seconds to wait before starting another charge. Default value: [2.0, 6.0].
charge_cooldown_time.x-runtime-constraint-description: Check that the limits imposed on the range (minimum, maximum and maximum distance between values) are respected

charge_overshoot_distance.description: Distance beyond the target the mob aims during a charge. Default value: 1.5.

charge_speed_multiplier.description: Speed multiplier applied during the charge. Default value: 10.

knockback_force.description: Knockback force applied to the target on hit. Default value: 2.

max_charge_distance.description: Maximum distance at which the mob attempts a charge. Default value: 16.

title: minecraft:behavior.aquatic_charge_attack
